project.name: Lib-Emoticon-Emoji-Images
project.description:
The library `Lib-Emoticon-Emoji-Images` contains all images from the emoticon-set `Emoji`.
The images can be accessed through the library `Lib-Emoticon-Emoji`. The class `EmojiEmoticonSet` allowed access to the single images through named constants. The images from this `EmoticonSet` can then be loaded with the help from the class `EmojiEmoticonLoader`.
Plz see also the library `Lib-Emoticon-Core` which provides a method to load an `Emoticon` as a JavaFX image -> `EmoticonProvider.getDefault().loadEmoticon(Emoticon, EmoticonLoader)`.
